title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 763/94 of 6 April 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2730/81 establishing a list of agencies in non-member importing countries entitled to issue invitations to tender in the milk and milk products sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 763/94 of 6 April 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2730/81 establishing a list of agencies in non-member importing countries entitled to issue invitations to tender in the milk and milk products sector
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2730/81, the list of issuing organizations shall be amended as follows:
For the importing country Algeria, the three following issuing agencies:
'Office régional du lait et des produits laitiers du centre (ORLAC),
1, Place Slimane Hmdadouchi,
Hussein Dey, Alger.
Office régional du lait et des produits laitiers de l'Est (Orelait),
Annaba,
route d'El Hadjar,
Algérie.
Office régional du lait et des produits laitiers de l'Ouest (Orolait).
87, avenue de l'Anp.
Es Senia/Oran,
Algérie.'
are replaced by:
'Groupement d'intérêt Commun des Offices du Lait Orelait-Orlac-Orolait,
1, Place Slimane Hmdadouchi,
Hussein Dey, Alger.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 April 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 30, 3. 2. 1994, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 272, 26. 9. 1981, p. 25.
(4) OJ No L 334, 6. 12. 1988, p. 14.
